name: HyperShift (HPMNK)
description:
Warning : use arrow key instead of WASD except if you use an AZERTY keyboard. Will be fixed after the jam Concept 

HyperShift is a space shooter with blend two specific features : 

- Time stop when you stop moving (inspired by the game SuperHot) 

- You can take the control of any ennemy in the screen, with your"Shift Shoot" ability. Use ennemies agains't each other, and get the best score ! 

Controls : 

Left Click : Shoot Bullets

Right Click : Shift Shoot 

Arrow Keys or WASD : Move (Mapped to french keyboard unfortunately) 

Credits 

This game has been made from scratch from 2 people, without any pre-existing assets 

Softands - Developer / Game Designer 

HPMNK - Sound Designer / Game Designer / Graphics 


Software used : 

Engine : Unity Atoms 

Audio : Ableton Live 

Graphics : Adobe Photoshop 2020
